text: creasing his brow , lowering his lids , and puckering the corners of his eyes , the canadian focused the full power of his gaze on the ship for a short while .
i straightened suddenly . i admit that i was less than ready for this announcement . i wanted to reply to the canadian , but words failed me .

" admitted , " the canadian replied , " but we 've got to risk it . freedom is worth paying for . besides , the longboat 's solidly built , and a few miles with the wind behind us is no big deal . by tomorrow , who knows if this ship wo n't be 100 leagues out to sea ? if circumstances are in our favor , between ten and eleven this evening we 'll be landing on some piece of solid ground , or we 'll be dead . so we 're in god 's hands , and i 'll see you this evening ! "

this issue settled , i went to find ned land . i wanted to take him with me . the obstinate canadian refused , and i could clearly see that his tight - lipped mood and his bad temper were growing by the day . under the circumstances i ultimately was n't sorry that he refused . in truth , there were too many seals ashore , and it would never do to expose this impulsive fisherman to such temptations .
" nothing , sir , " the canadian replied . " he said you 'd already discussed this little stroll . "
" what 's more , " the canadian added , " if they catch me , i 'll defend myself , i 'll fight to the death . "
" me ? " the canadian replied . " i 'm a professional harpooner ! it 's my job to make a mockery of them ! "
" ye gods , " the canadian shot back , " i 'm starting to appreciate the charms of cannibalism ! "

to say canadian is to say french , and as unsociable as ned land was , i must admit he took a definite liking to me . no doubt it was my nationality that attracted him . it was an opportunity for him to speak , and for me to hear , that old rabelaisian dialect still used in some canadian provinces . the harpooner 's family originated in quebec , and they were already a line of bold fishermen back in the days when this town still belonged to france .

to say canadian is to say french , and as unsociable as ned land was , i must admit he took a definite liking to me . no doubt it was my nationality that attracted him . it was an opportunity for him to speak , and for me to hear , that old rabelaisian dialect still used in some canadian provinces . the harpooner 's family originated in quebec , and they were already a line of bold fishermen back in the days when this town still belonged to france .

" wooden ships maybe , " the canadian replied . " but i 've never seen the like . so till i have proof to the contrary , i 'll deny that baleen whales , sperm whales , or unicorns can do any such thing . "
" and how will you prepare it ? " i asked the canadian .
" not quite , professor , " the canadian replied . " we need some fruit to go with it , or at least some vegetables . "

" note well , my fine canadian , " i went on , " if such an animal exists , if it lives deep in the ocean , if it frequents the liquid strata located miles beneath the surface of the water , it needs to have a constitution so solid , it defies all comparison . "
" excellent , ned , " i said , extending my hand to the canadian .

ned land still kept up the most tenacious skepticism ; beyond his spells on watch , he pretended that he never even looked at the surface of the waves , at least while no whales were in sight . and yet the marvelous power of his vision could have performed yeoman service . but this stubborn canadian spent eight hours out of every twelve reading or sleeping in his cabin . a hundred times i chided him for his unconcern .
" all right , ned , " i asked the canadian , " now what do you need ? "
" but do n't you realize , professor aronnax , " the canadian replied , " that soon we 'll have been imprisoned for three whole months aboard this nautilus ? "

so the skiff did n't leave shipside that day , much to the displeasure of mr . land who could n't complete his provisions . the adroit canadian spent his time preparing the meat and flour products he had brought from gueboroa island . as for the savages , they went back to shore near eleven o'clock in the morning , when the heads of coral began to disappear under the waves of the rising tide . but i saw their numbers swell considerably on the beach . it was likely that they had come from neighboring islands or from the mainland of papua proper . however , i did n't see one local dugout canoe .
" but where are the fish ? " the canadian ventured to observe . " i do n't see any fish ! "
" to put a simple question to you , sir , " the canadian answered me .
" all right , " the canadian said , " then why should there be any more than that ? "
" no problem , " the canadian went on insistently .

on this note i was about to withdraw ; but captain nemo detained me and invited me to take a seat next to him . he questioned me with interest on our excursions ashore and on our hunting , but seemed not to understand the canadian 's passionate craving for red meat . then our conversation skimmed various subjects , and without being more forthcoming , captain nemo proved more affable .
" you saw that ? " the canadian asked .

the next day , november 9 , i woke up only after a long , twelve - hour slumber . conseil , a creature of habit , came to ask " how master 's night went , " and to offer his services . he had left his canadian friend sleeping like a man who had never done anything else .
" does anybody fish for 'em nowadays ? " the canadian asked .
this maneuver did not escape the canadian .

the canadian might have quoted a much lower price . so it was imperative to make contact with whatever beings were confined inside the plating of this machine . i searched its surface for an opening or a hatch , a " manhole , " to use the official term ; but the lines of rivets had been firmly driven into the sheet - iron joins and were straight and uniform .
" tell it to the marines , sir , " answered the stubborn canadian .

" what i 've got to tell you is very simple , " the canadian replied . " we 're in europe , and before captain nemo 's whims take us deep into the polar seas or back to oceania , i say we should leave this nautilus . "

" professor aronnax , " the canadian replied , " your arguments are rotten to the core . you talk way off in the future : ' we 'll be here , we 'll be there ! ' me , i 'm talking about right now : we are here , and we must take advantage of it ! "

captain nemo inserted his cranium into its spherical headgear . conseil and i did the same , but not without hearing the canadian toss us a sarcastic " happy hunting . " on top , the suit ended in a collar of threaded copper onto which the metal helmet was screwed . three holes , protected by heavy glass , allowed us to see in any direction with simply a turn of the head inside the sphere . placed on our backs , the rouquayrol device went into operation as soon as it was in position , and for my part , i could breathe with ease .
" when ? " the canadian asked insistently .

" well , professor , " the canadian replied , " you can just drop that idea ! you 've made it to the ice bank , which is already far enough , but you wo n't get any farther , neither your captain nemo or his nautilus . and whether he wants to or not , we 'll head north again , in other words , to the land of sensible people . "

" there you go again , conseil my friend ! " the impatient canadian shot back . " you never allow yourself any displays of bile or attacks of nerves ! you 're everlastingly calm ! you 'd say your after - meal grace even if you did n't get any food for your before - meal blessing-- and you 'd starve to death rather than complain ! "
" i have your word , ned , " i answered the canadian .
i left him and climbed onto the platform . conseil and the canadian were already there .

" every animal may be overstating it , but in truth i doubt we could keep our canadian friend from harpooning some of these magnificent cetaceans . which would be an affront to captain nemo , since he hates to slay harmless beasts needlessly . "
